title: Spacious One-Bedroom! Ready to move-in
posting_body: ['Bancroft Towers', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '13475 Bancroft Ave San Leandro, CA 94578', '1X1  1 \xa0bed / 1 bath / 650 Sq.', 'Ft / $2,145', '* Unit 306 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 309 - Available', 'Now', 'A nice place to call home', 'This one-bedroom, one-bathroom model at Bancroft Towers comes with recent upgrades that you will love.', 'Inside, designer two-tone paint adds an element of modern style and complements flooring options that may include wood-style LVT flooring or plush carpeting.', 'In the kitchen of upgraded models, you’ll also discover stainless steel appliances and stone tile flooring.', 'In addition to these features, chandelier ceiling fans and floor-to-ceiling mirrored closets add even more comfort and convenience.', 'The offerings extend beyond your home as well.', 'Take care of laundry day with ease by using the on-site clothes care center.', 'Say hello to your neighbors when you visit the recreation room and gain a friend or two.', 'Take advantage of the refreshing pool during warmer months.', 'You can rely on the management staff to assist you when needed.', 'Reach out to the leasing office to learn more.', 'Floor Plan/Unit
